content.div:
The stomach-churning Rihanna/Chris Brown lovefest continues. He wished her a happy birthday on Twitter, and she responded. As if that wasn't bad enough, the pair released two new collabs yesterday. Listen to them here.

--

Miranda Lambert, meanwhile, is still not a Chris Brown fan.

--

There's still no photographic proof, but eyewitnesses say Jessica Biel was flashing her engagement ring at SNL's after-party.

--

It's fun in the sun time for celebs. Megan Fox and Brian Austin Green hit the beach in Hawaii, Lea Michele vacationed in Cabo, while Gisele and Tom Brady soaked up some rays in Costa Rica.

--

Lindsay Lohan is staging her upteenth comeback by hosting SNL next week. Of course, because it's Lindsay Lohan, she'll have absolutely no upcoming projects to promote.

--

Congrats to Friday Night Lights' Scott Porter, who's engaged.

--

More sad news coming from the Houston camp. Hours after Whitney's funeral, reports surfaced that her daughter Bobbi disappeared and was later found getting high.

--

Meanwhile, Whitney Houston's wardrobe from The Bodyguard will be up for auction.

--

Does anyone else feel like Jessica Simpson has been pregnant forever?

--

Miley Cyrus got another stupid tattoo, bringing her total to 12.

--

Jennifer Aniston is insisting she didn't hook up with Justin Theroux until after his marriage ended.

--

Lourdes may be going on tour as one of her mother Madonna's backup dancers.

--

Speaking of tours, for the first time since the show started, the cast of Glee will not be hitting the road this summer.

--

Oscar-winning actress Judi Dench is downplaying reports she's going blind.

--

Some new stills from The Hunger Games have landed.

--

Victoria Beckham is defending her "fatigued" appearance at New York Fashion Week by saying she's a tired, working mother.

--

Nick Jonas is single again.

--

Check back to Dose.ca throughout the day for your entertainment fix.

entry.title: Are Rihanna and Chris Brown Hooking Up to Make Music? Or Just Hooking Up?

link.Abstract: According to sources, Rihanna and Chris Brown are heating up again – at least in the studio.
link.title: [ more ]

link.Abstract: Reports continue to circulate that the Barbados-born beauty invited Brown to her pre-birthday bash on Valentine’s Day, with TMZ claiming he asked his entourage to try to force everyone in the club to sign confidentiality agreements before he entered.
link.title: Reports continue to circulate that the Barbados-born beauty invited Brown to her pre-birthday bash on Valentineâ€™s Day, with TMZ claiming he asked his entourage to try to force everyone in the club to sign confidentiality agreements before he entered.

link.Abstract: The admitted woman-beater hit on an employee of Lasio Professional Hair Care's Grammy gift lounge using one of the most disturbing pick-up lines ever.
link.title: Chris Brown Reportedly Uses "I Promise I Won't Beat You" As Pick-Up Line; World Collectively Gags

link.Abstract: A pile of famous folks took to Twitter to voice their disgust with the Grammys' Chris Brown love-fest, and Brown responded by telling them to "f*ck off."
link.title: Update: Unapologetic Chris Brown Tells Haters to 'F*ck Off'

link.Abstract: Chris Brown lost a request to reduce his five-year probataion sentence. Still, expect to see the pop star at the Grammy Awards Sunday, playing the same stage as Rihanna.
link.title: Chris Brown Loses Plea To Reduce Probation (He's Still Playing the Grammys, Though)

link.Abstract: Despite hookup rumours, Rihanna and Chris Brown reportedly kept their distance at an L.A. hotspot earlier this week.
link.title: Rihanna and Chris Brown Ignore Each Other at L.A. Nightclub

link.Abstract: According to Us Weekly, Rihanna and Chris Brown have been secretly hooking up for nearly a year.
link.title: Are Rihanna and Chris Brown Hooking Up...Again?

link.Abstract: Rihanna showed off a new blonde 'do yesterday. Vote on the songstress' latest look!
link.title: Poll: What Do You Think of Rihanna's New 'Do?

link.Abstract: After a Dutch fashion magazine ran a story on Rihanna with the headline "De N***abitch," the pop star responded via Twitter, saying the story degraded "an entire race." The editor who approved the piece has since resigned.
link.title: Rihanna Slams Fashion Magazine's 'Degrading' Slur as Editor Resigns

link.Abstract: Rihanna's latest single off Talk That Talk is here. Listen to "You Da One."
link.title: Listen: Rihanna Debuts New Single 'You Da One'

link.Abstract: Rihanna was grabbed by an over-eager fan during her performance of "S&M" on Today. Watch the video.
link.title: Rihanna Gets Man-Handled By Fan During Today Show Performance

link.Abstract: Rihanna has been performing in Brazil for days, and it was all leading up to her Sept. 24 set at Rock in Rio. We've got photos.
link.title: Photos: Rihanna Plays Rock In Rio

link.Abstract: Rihanna is once again getting nearly naked for a new Emporio Armani Underwear ad campaign. Check out the hot ads!
link.title: Photos: Rihanna for Armani

entry.content: According to sources, Rihanna and Chris Brown are heating up again – at least in the studio.
